humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report states that the invasive component of the tumor measures 3.0 cm (sum of the sizes of multiple invasive tumors). This puts the tumor in the T2 stage, as T2 tumors are more than 2 cm but not more than 5 cm.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report indicates that the tumor in the right breast measures 3.0 cm (sum of the sizes of multiple invasive tumors), which falls in the T2 category. The T2 category includes tumors that are greater than 2 cm in size but not greater than 5 cm in size. The maximum size of the tumor is used to determine the T stage, and in this case, it is 3.0 cm. Therefore, the T stage for this patient's cancer is T2.
